word_mean: 微生物：微小的生命体，具医学意义的有细菌、立克次体、病毒、霉菌及原虫

sentence.Network_en: A single - celled microorganism, especially a flagellate protozoan of the genus Monas.
sentence.Network_cn: 单胞体 单细胞 的微生物, 尤指单''.'胞'. ''虫类的有鞭毛的原生动物.

sentence.Network_en: Aeration is a tank where microorganism decompose organism in waste water.
sentence.Network_cn: 曝气池是栖息在活性污泥中的微生物分解污水中有机物的场所.

病原微生物(Pathogenic microorganism)：寄生于生物(包括人)机体并引起疾病的微生物。又称病原体(pathogen)。

entry.def: A micro-organism is a very small living thing which you can only see if you use a microscope.

auth_sentence.content: Background Bacteria, which are a type of microorganism, turn milk into yogurt.

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, the species hopping of a microorganism bit is pretty cool: a new species, though more parasitic than symbiotic.

sentences.en: The diseased tissue can be easily invaded by these microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 有病的组织容易被微生物侵袭。

sentences.en: They act at least a temporary block to DNA synthesis in microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 它们在微生物中至少对DNA合成起暂时性的阻止作用。
